name: War In Heaven
description:
The dust parts and two remains.

Only one will leave alive.

War In Heaven is a bullet hell with dynamically changing arena! The enemy will try to trap you before inevitably killing you. Be aware of the walls, the bullets, everything!

The game is a submission for the Bullet Hell Game Jam 2022 with the theme: Constrained!

Tutorial WASDMovement(Hold) Left Mouse Button
FireSpacebarBomb Credits

Developed by Steventus

Music from Ove Melaa

Additional Sounds from www.zapsplat.com

Follow me on Twitter Follow me on Steam
